website_summaries.verdict: Superior performance combined with durable design. The best on the market.
pros: Quickly and easily blasts away dirt and grime
Two wands for heavy-duty and lighter jobs
Water-cooled induction motor significantly extends motor life/boosts performance
cons: Plastic hose connection feels somewhat flimsy
Assembly manual could be more straightforward

website_summaries.verdict: A pricey model, but the K5 has a bit more water pressure than you'll find in some other electric models.
pros: Delivers up to 2,000 psi of water pressure and 1.4 gallons per minute of water
Reaches a water height of 25 feet
Great-looking design that you're going to love using for all kinds of jobs
Large handle makes it a snap to move
cons: Assembly can be a little difficult
May not last as long as you'd expect at this price point

customer_reviews.title: Wheels fall off.  Poorly designed for mobility.
customer_reviews.text: Have had for abt. 2 years now and this unit functions reasonably well. However the wheel design is deficient in that there is no spindle just a flange socket to 'snap-in' the wheel. After wheeling about for only a few uses the wells fell off and no longer hold and cannot be modified or re-installed due to design...Another note: Others have complained about breakage at the plastic hose inlet. I fitted it with a 3' washing machine hose to effect strain relief. Problem solved. This device not recommended for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Cabitto

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Virtually impossible to assemble as instructed - had to attempt workarounds. Once plugged in, would not turn on. Product is absolutely useless. Amazon not supporting the product is another HUGE problem -- must contact the original producer which is also virtually impossible. WORTHLESS - do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luers

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Karcher Pressure washer in 14 years. I have used this machines at my home for several years and have had good performance and results. The folks at Karcher were superhelpful when I contacted them directly about a broken part. I could have not asked for better results!! I am loyal to the brand and would highly recommend this product to other home owners. If you wash your car get their foam cannon its the only way I wash my cars now. Just use the thick car shampoo as it produces thick foamy results.
customer_reviews.author: Pats Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great design and quality leak-proof construction. This pressure washer is very nice for a homeowner's use at 2k pressure. The wan design is clever in that you twist the want to go from low pressure (soap dispensing) to high pressure (washing and rinsing with water only). I have only used it a couple of times (once to wash concrete and once to wash vehicles) and I find it convenient and effective for those uses. Next job is cleaning siding and I am confident this machine is up to the task. The pressure washer runs only while the trigger is depressed and it runs relatively quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this washer in January. It’s a good washer for the money. The purpose of this review is to tell you about Karcher’s amazing customer service. The washer developed a leak in the pump. Since it’s been 9 months since the purchase date, I thought I was screwed. I contacted Karcher and they instructed me to send them a copy of the original receipt and the serial number tag. I did and a week later I had a new K5!!!!! Customer service is alive and well and it lives at Karcher!!!! I’m a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Solly

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Product came in factory sealed box. I opened and started assembly using almost useless directions and realized I was missing a part. I called Karcher and they sent part at no charge. I restarted assembly and was missing another part and got it from Karcher. I restarted assembly and am missing a third part. These are not small parts and are essential to assembly. I will call Karcher again but this is entirely unsatisfactory for any product of this price!
customer_reviews.author: HARRY WISE

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Hose, otherwise great product - I should have paid attention to the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after my 15-year old Karcher pooped out. Was very happy with my first one, but the hose on this "top of the line" unit is plastic garbage, unlike its predecessor. It's too firm (i.e. not flexible) and trying to get it back on the reel is a pain in the butt. Seems like the company felt the need to cut corners, and the hose (one of the most important features) was chosen as the target for cheapness.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but the gun sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This washer works pretty well. I use it to detail in my one car detail shop. So the super long gun doesn't work well. I went and got an adapter so fit the ridiculous Karcher quick connect hose ends. There is no reason, other than to just have you but their products to use a style like that. I got an MTM gun with quick connect. It works WAY better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works great ... when it works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this July 18, 2018 On July 23, 2019 I called them to say that the sprayer was not working. I was told it was out of warranty, (5 days) and that the sprayer should be wrapped in rags for the winter so that it won't freeze. I winterized the unit but who has ever heard of wrapping the sprayer in rags!!! Paid $ 209. for the whole unit and they want $ 59. for the spay handle. I will never buy from them again. Used it one time!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Golden

customer_reviews.title: Weak Sauce
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve used a gas powered pressure washer, don’t waste your time with this one. Sure it has its place, and might be nice to use on your vehicle for a wash- however, i went to pressure wash my deck/patio and this just didn’t have the necessary ‘umph’ to get me there. I ended up borrowing my neighbors gas powered Honda. I learned my lesson here...if you’re one the fence, get a gas powered proper motor.
customer_reviews.author: The Combover

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made plastic insides fail repeatedly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June of last year - upon the FIRST time I connected the hose to it (a small gauge, not powerful hose), the insides burst and leaked water everywhere. I called Karcher for a replacement, which they sent about a month later. That too has now broken with the same problem. In total, I probably used it 8-10 times before it failed. Avoid this cheaply made hunk of junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred K

customer_reviews.title: Nice washer, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I would have given the washer five stars but the base came with a broken part. I do give the customer support five stars. I called about the broken part and they shipped me a new one the same day. I had the new part in two days. I've only used the washer once, for about 20 minutes and it worked fine. The jury is still out on durability, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ugene

customer_reviews.title: Used it 2 or 3 times the 1st summer put ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it 2 or 3 times the 1st summer put it way for the winter in my heated garage. Pulled it out the next worked once and that was it. Replaced the inline power interrupter in the cord nothing. Tried getting in touch Karcher near impossible I wish I had not bought almost accessory available just taking up space now.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cernuto

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good quality, works amazing. My issue is the soap dispenser does not work (not a big deal I have a foam cannon) but wait, proprietary attachments only means you have to buy a kartcher adapter to use that too. A little expensive but if you want a quality machine I can honestly say this thing works great.
customer_reviews.author: ManOfManyInterests

customer_reviews.title: Effective, quiet, great attachments
customer_reviews.text: Bought this powerwasher in order to have the turbo nozzle - when shopping I noticed that not all brands at this price point come with this specific attachment. I also purchased the T300 driveway attachment. Makes doing large surfaces go so much faster, although I do touch up stubborn spots with the turbo nozzle. No complaints at all so far. Works great! Simple to assemble and figure out how to use. Well priced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: EN-TWINED

customer_reviews.title: I prefer this over any sunjoe pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, good pressure. The bayonet system is annoying since you will need an adapter for your existing accessories, but it's easy to swap things out in comparison as well. Assembly took about 20 minutes, including the time it takes to figure out the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: DubmasterW

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washer works great for a electric it has good pressure. Some plastic connectors should be brass for the price of this pressure washer and if it was it would be 5 stars for sure.I also think karcher should include the adaptor for aftermarket pressure washer accessories with this purchase. I mean come on this ain’t a cheap pressure washer that’s the least they could do.
customer_reviews.author: Coojo

customer_reviews.title: Power washing is my new favorite home maintenance task...
customer_reviews.text: Great power washer. I love that I can switch the spray pattern on the fly. It doesn’t tip over and is easy for me to move around. We had a little bit of trouble getting the short hose that draws the water through the machine to connect to the spray hose (around the wheel). Two brass fittings had to click together and not pull apart. After 30 mins of shoving it in and pulling it out—just as we were about to give up and invoke the return process—it clicked loudly and we were done. Glad it came together. We’ve used it to power wash vinyl siding, an aluminum awning and cedar furniture. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carlston

customer_reviews.title: excellent power for electric pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace my 10 yr old Karcher when it's the motor gave out. This unit has excellent pressure and water flow volume. I have used it to clean mildew stains from a brick porch and wood decking. The power nozzle really does increase the power. The hose and electric cord store nicely which is a aggravation with some units.
customer_reviews.author: skivet

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in December 2018 , but open box it last week ( April 2019), and try to use. Detergent control does not work, it does not not suck detergent. So I can use only water. Very disappointed with my purchase. I cannot return it because it is over 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.

customer_reviews.title: Stable to use, hose reel is nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well day 1. Kind of a pain to put together, but not really hard. You do need a Phillips head screwdriver with a long shank for one part - mine was about an Inch too short so I had to get a new one. Cleaning is easy, typical power washer part. The reel for the power washer hose is a nice touch to help keep the part together. Hopefully this last longer than the last powerwasher I had.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use, seems built to last.
customer_reviews.text: This washer has more power than my previous one, and is nice and quiet. Set up and put away is easy due to the pressure hose reel and quick connect for the water hose. The included wands are a different take on the usual replaceable tips, but work well. Seems decently built for this price/performance point. If it lasts longer than my last (not Kärcher) one, I'll be very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs brass fittings! Leaks bad!
customer_reviews.text: Why don't these things come with brass fittings. I tried a new hose, super tight, flipping it around. No good. Sent it back. I bought a Sun Joe, and bought brass adapters to go with it. Have not tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Works great, prefer better storage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had Karcher for the quality and this is no exception. I wish they had a better design for the pressure pipes and always find those a bit of a pain to store etc but the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Quiet operation.
customer_reviews.text: Amazed really works as advertised . Great to power wash large yacht deck with no damage to gel coat. Forget the deck brushes forever.
customer_reviews.author: jmgmd

customer_reviews.title: Second failed unit
customer_reviews.text: First in 2017, worked great. Failed 1st use in 2018, was replaced no quibble. Worked great. Guess what... 1st use in 2019? FAIL.... they are replacing but I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: betsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Washer
customer_reviews.text: The is the easiest to use and most powerful electric pressure washer I have used. I have owned two other brands both have failed after a few weeks of use. While this one still has to prove its lastibility, so far this is by far the best unit I have had experience with. The water stream out of the high pressure nozzle matches that of the gas powered unit we use on the farm.
customer_reviews.author: Canasta

customer_reviews.title: Water leaking from casing and then shorted out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an Amazon Warehouse "deal". I should have known better. It arrived looking like it had been run over by a forklift. Box was smashed. Unit leaked water from all of its joints as soon as it was turned on. After two or three uses it stopped working - motor likely shorted out. Don't know how a new one would have performed but Amazon Warehouse "deals" are not deals.
customer_reviews.author: Louis B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 15 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were just awful but I was able to figure it out. The graphics weren't large enough nor specific enough. Anyway, got it assembled and got ready for my project. The machine worked for 15 seconds and we haven't been able to get it to work since. I wouldn't recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fully met expectations
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the 4th Kaercher pressure washer I’ve bought. As robust as the previous ones but the addition of a roller for the hose and several hooks and holders for pipes, wires, wands etc makes this easier to use. I hope it lasts 13years like my last one! As with everything the plastic and metal parts are cost engineered but still well made
customer_reviews.author: Martyjimbo

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Ours arrived and didn't work properly-called Karcher, got immediate help-had new unit 3 days later! Works great and a deal for the price-this our second Karcher power washer--don't waste your money on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Skundtz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good but long-term---?
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a friend who said this was an excellent power washer. I bought it, assembled it and have used it. So far so good but I am nervous about the long-term durability. The washer housing is all plastic and works fine but it is a bit temperamental when getting it started. It works great at cleaning a blue-stone patio and natural stone retaining wall which is why we purchased it. Based on the previous reviews I invested in the 4 year product warranty. I hope not to need it but having used the washer a couple of times I'll be glad I did. I recommend with a bit of caution
customer_reviews.author: mark07043

customer_reviews.title: I can pee harder than this washer
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking easy to assemble etc. But absolutely no usable pressure
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, takes about 15 minutes to assemble out of the box. Definitely recommend looking up a YouTube video for it. Just don’t forget to secure the hose with the provided metal clip—otherwise it will keep slipping on when you turn on the water. Also, every time you turn it on, you’ll have to hit the reset button on the wall plug.
customer_reviews.author: Matthijs

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This power washer does a very good job without the hassle of starting up a gas washer. I added the Karcher deck washer which also does a good job on concrete and a Trex deck. The deck washer fittings did not fit with the new washer but I had an older Karcher which did fit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Received this "power" washer in Mid March. It's been used exactly 4 times. None for more than 30 minutes. Worked great twice. Third time I couldn't get the soap to dispense (haven't even used a full container yet). Today (two weeks later) I plugged it in and it won't turn on at all. Absolutely no reason...it's almost brand new. Either I bought a lemon of a pressure washer, or I bought a bright yellow doorstop. Totally disappointed in this POS. Don't recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Douggie

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is plastic junk........two years in a row one of the plastic internal pipes developed a crack and started leaking. Unit was drained at the end of each season and crack still developed.
customer_reviews.author: taximom4evr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second karcher power washer and I’m very satisfied with it. Works great all the time and cleans very well. I took my time putting it together which took awhile but wasn’t bad. I would definitely recommend this power washer
customer_reviews.author: nola girl

customer_reviews.title: Electric spray washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sprayer for the money. The detergent doesn't go out the way I would like it. It's a little bit underpowered. It can do lightweight jobs, but if you need to push any dirt on cement or asphalt you better get a powerful gas one.
customer_reviews.author: David Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: It's not always easy to start. It's designed in Germany but made in China, and has some of the shortcuts in quality that go with that. Such as sometimes it takes 5 tries and 10 minutes to get it to start.
customer_reviews.author: shaskell

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Returned this one. Cannot believe they can sell me uncheck returned product as I see water inside the pipes when assembling the parts. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Kiet P.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, leaks and leaks some more
customer_reviews.text: Works well but, you guessed it; it leaks. The connector for the garden hose quick disconnect leaks and leaks some more.
customer_reviews.author: skeeter

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pressure washer except for the cheap stiff hose. Plenty of power for its size and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: IHC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: JUNK! I am very disappointed with this pressure washer. It quit working after two uses. This is suppose to be THE pressure washer in Germany so I spent the extra money to get a product that would last. I have had much better service and durability from cheap machines from Lowes and Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Gene D.

customer_reviews.title: Was OK for an electric model, but was under-powered ...
customer_reviews.text: Was OK for an electric model, but was under-powered for the job we have to do. Had to get a gasoline powered unit. However, during our performance test, it performed as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Heard it was a pretty good pressure washer even with plastic parts. I used it once to test it out and had decent pressure. The time I actually tried using it there was no pressure and stop working. Plus had to buy different adapter which you can only get from karcher or specific just for this brand
customer_reviews.author: Saul ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used it twice or 3 times max then it broke down! Very cheap materials. I disassembled it to find out what was wrong and I will probably have to send it to fix it and as usual it will cost more than I bought it for, this is not what Karcher quality should be. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Steve Morris

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Electric Power Washer
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to assembly instructions! Everything assembled nicely. The power washing hose reel is a big plus. Operation is simple. Has a good strong spray. Worth the extra money to buy this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Martin

customer_reviews.title: Killed by freezing
customer_reviews.text: This unit was damaged beyond repair by freezing weather... you really need to design a pump that won't self destruct when it freezes with water still in the pump... food for engineering thought.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Bleakney III

customer_reviews.title: The engine is water cooled
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product which is being used 2 - 3 times a week - I expect it to hold up as well as my last one - buying it again speaks for itself, doesn't it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank God, Amazon Prime has an easy return policy!
customer_reviews.text: The overall power of this machine was disappointing. My Jet setting on my water hose worked just as well. Also I had to lean over within 3-6 inches of the surface to be cleaned and it only did a small spot of dirt removal. At that rate, I would have been better off using a brush and an environmental friendly soap product to clean surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pressure washer in 2016, used it a few times and put it in storage for 2 years. I pulled it out of storage and used it for the past year and a half. It stopped working after using it on my front porch. Definitley not worth the extra money I paid thinking it would last 3 times longer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great at pressure washing but inconvenient.
customer_reviews.text: Power and reliability are there for this pressure washer. But I’d stop at ease of use. Because it depends what you’re doing. If you’re washing a car with a foamer or under carriage cleaner, you cannot unless you buy an adapter for their proprietary connection to the standard quick connect pressure washer hoses. Makes switching between nozzles very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Hazem Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a car wash
customer_reviews.text: The unit is good for washing cars, etc. definitely not 2100 psi, I’d say maybe 1500, as I used to work on pressure washers for a job. Overall it does what I want it to, it’s quiet and it beats listening to a gas powered u it for an hr while cleaning your vehicles. It definitely won’t strip the paint off a house by any means. The 25’ hose is too short. Needs to be 50’. Hopefully theirs an extension.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: variable pressure and volume possibilities
customer_reviews.text: Quieter unit then similar one I have in Europe. water cooling the motor seems a good idea sometimes does not like starting maybe caused by airlock in the unit, easy to remedy
customer_reviews.author: schoufra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pressure washer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and did a bang up job if I don't say so myself! It's got plenty of power at 2000 psi and is super easy to move around. He's been really impressed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Washer is made of 95% cheep plastic, handles, covers hooks, breaking very easy
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with new Karcher K5 product, not worth of money they are asking for. I had older version for 10 years, but this one probably won't last a year, it's falling apart already.
customer_reviews.author: Neno

customer_reviews.title: very poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use it out of the box. Missing retention clip......very poor customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Shazia Waseem

customer_reviews.title: Good little washer
customer_reviews.text: Really light, but really powerful. It has an ocelating tip that works great. Used it all summer and so far I have no complaints. Not professional grade but good around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I own another older model karcher that didn’t require assembly and it works much better than this one. Don’t buy thru Amazon, if you return it you will only get third of your money back due to shipping costs. Buy One at your local hardware store .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great and it is easier to use than gas. It has all the power I need around the house.
customer_reviews.author: TPC LV

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it less than 2 years ago. Used it a couple of times to clean my car. Today it stop and restarts about every minute. Pressure stays oke Many users write about this karcher issue. What is the cause? My recomendation would be not to buy karcher based on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Misset M E

customer_reviews.title: want to return
customer_reviews.text: not as good as the description. this is a replacement, the first one had a bad plug. the second does not have good pressure. want yo return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Easy to assemble. Purchased the deck/patio cleaning attachment as well. Works effortlessly without any sweeping marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I am very satisfied! Have used it for cleaning the pool deck ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased this unit, but I am very satisfied! Have used it for cleaning the pool deck that hadn't been cleaned for a year, and also washed side of brick house. Well pleased! I'll be getting the attachment for washing my truck next!
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our old one finally broke. Hubby's pretty handy and said it couldn't be fixed. This one works great. Anyone that lives in a house, needs pressure washers.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalLin

customer_reviews.title: Best in the world
customer_reviews.text: Best in the world, I can’t say anything about it 100000 present perfect, i want yo keep it always and never use anything else 👍👍👈👍
customer_reviews.author: Emad-Salami

customer_reviews.title: Internal leak detected during the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Not completely new item with a few scratches, PREVIOUSLY RETURNED WITH WATER INSIDE! Internal leak was detected with the first use after arrival. Made in China, not Germany. Waste of time caused by Amazon resending previously returned Items!
customer_reviews.author: MARIUS-T

customer_reviews.title: JUST OK
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Not very strong. Assembly was more of a job than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Used!
customer_reviews.text: Unit came damaged and there was water inside of it, indicating it had been used. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: C-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Second replaced unit also stopped working with the SAME electrical defect. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Electrical fault. Both new units stopped after two hours of continual use. Same issue. Electrical box cannot be repaired, entire unit must be recycled, extremely wasteful. Paperwork to be filed with Karcher company to work through formal process. Save yourself the headache and weeks of processing time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Cleaned 6000 SF of concrete driveway and two tiled patios. Took 16 hours with the 11” rotary head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity, so easy to set up and put away.
customer_reviews.text: House siding, windows, concrete and vehicle. Was so easy to set up and use and put away.
customer_reviews.author: bart traynor

customer_reviews.title: Tough power washer with all the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Love this hard working machine. Be sure and order the flat round head attachment so you can clean your driveway, flat deck/patio, steps,etc. haven't tried it using detergent but I bet that would work great ! This machine is built to last. Nice places to put the extra pieces and easy clean up after you use it,,,,then you'll be in a better mood to clean when you start off with a clean machine!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The hose connection fittings leak and I even tried using ...
customer_reviews.text: The hose connection fittings leak and I even tried using plumber tape. I expect to get wet when you power wash but not from the fittings. I may be going to the Menards to buy new hose fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product came in perfect condition and no missing parts. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in perfect condition and no missing parts. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Archer K5-you’ll love it
customer_reviews.text: I needed to clean my patio concrete and front of my house. I’ve only done the patio but it was easy to use and did a great job with the two wands.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all jobs around farm
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it on the farm, but so far it has tackled every job with ease! We have cleaned out equipment, sprayed off the front porches and it did the jobs perfect. Sprayer has so much power it did take the paint off car the car where there was a ding....lots of power.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Williams

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR IT WORKS GREAT, PLEASE TRUST THE NAME THEY MAKE A GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: JOE DERO

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This machine does not work well and is awkward to maneuver. The spray lack power
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Unit is very nice and using in place of a smaller Karcher that ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit is very nice and using in place of a smaller Karcher that does not idle when the handle is released. Can’t figure out how to attach the right angle attachment to work with the extension kit I also purchased
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Priest

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE INVESTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I GAVE MY GAS PRESSURE WASHER TO MY SON. REPLACED IT WITH THIS ONE (AFTER EXTENSIVE RESEARCH). VERY HIGH QUALITY AND MANUFACTURING DETAIL. NOT AS POWERFUL AS GAS BUT EASY TO TRANSPORT AND USE.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Akin

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer without the hassle of having to gasoline
customer_reviews.text: Are use this power washer to clean my paver driveway it got the dirt from the cracks the weeds the moss and everything else it worked great with the dirt blaster tip. However the dirt blaster tip stopped working properlySo I called Karcher and they sent me a new one .
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best power washer on the market. So easy to use and does a great job. Looked for one at the local box hardware stores and couldn't find one. Searched Amazon as I was walking out of the third store and had it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Works better then I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: Easily removed mildew and stains from driveway and sidewalk. Assembly was a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Stenson

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. Stopped working on the third time being used. Do not purchase. Do not know why Amazon would make this product their choice. No way it should have a five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Cappelluti

customer_reviews.title: bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit a short time ago and upon receiving and using it was not working well. With further investigation it turns out that an internal main part, as indicated in the attached photo, is leaking. and Amzon didnt help with any good solution
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better disgn to prevent tip overs.
customer_reviews.text: The new anti-tip platform below the water inlet and pressure hose outlet protects the mechanism from tip overs. My previous version of this tipped and broke.
customer_reviews.author: CTYANKEY

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine I just get it and I clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine I just get it and I clean Monday morning my patio next will do the hous and car
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Zaga

customer_reviews.title: Could not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Karcher K5 Premium Electric Power Pressure Washer came in a set of parts that were difficult to put together and once put together did not function as it was anticipated. It was a disappointing purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sellers-young

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I was used to Kaercher products made in Germany. This one is most likely produced in China - but still very good quality and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions could be illustrated better to make things easier to understand, but it is pretty intuitive. It worked the first time it was used. Easy to use, and it is effective.
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: A great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I love this proper washer, light weight, easily to use
customer_reviews.author: Vivian A.

customer_reviews.title: Realistic price should have been $150 in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward unit with a hose reel. Not really sure why it was so much more expensive than one without a reel since everything is made from flimsy plastic. Realistic price should have been $150 in my opinion. One thing that already concerns me is the port to hook up the garden hose is again made from flimsy plastic and I can already see that getting broke by accident moving machine around work area. Has good strong pressure but not so much as to cause damage to what is being washed. Still works and nothing broken as of yet so keeping fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product! Works great, easy to set-up and use. My gas powered washer was so cumbersome that I never wanted to use it.....this is quite the opposite. It's so easy to operate that you want to find ways to use it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monroe Mac

customer_reviews.title: Would HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product today! Very easy to put together and set up! I was surprised by how much power it put out for an electric power washer! Would recommend to anyone for household use. This pressure washer blasted my mold/moss covered retaining wall in seconds, without even using cleaner. I'm very impressed. Impressed enough to write a review!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.... no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this thing so far. Hookin up my new soap cannon this weekend an scrub a dub dub'in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kip D. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for old Karcher, this one is excellent! Recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking deck
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned three decks, plenty of power. Get the T300 attachment, helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for an electric power washer, connections for water are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Whitty

product_meta.title: Karcher K5 Premium Electric Power Pressure Washer, 2000 PSI, 1.4 GPM
product_meta.description:
Karcher’s 2000 PSI K5 pressure washer is our highest power electrical machine, delivering high pressure cleaning for tough jobs. Pressurized hose reel conveniently protects and stores the hose. The patented induction motor is water cooled to increase life up to 5X. Vario and Dirtblaster wands included to tackle most outdoor cleaning needs. Detergent tank included.


Specifications::: Model: K5 Premium, Part Number: 1.603-361.0, Performance Ratings: 2000 PSI 1.4 GPM, Motor: Water Cooled Induction, Pump: Karcher N-Cor, Water Inlet: N-Cor Quick Connect, Water Outlet: N-Cor Quick Connect, Trigger Gun: Quick Connect, High Pressure hose: 25ft. Thermoplastic, Included Spray Wands: Vario Power Spray Wand - Dirtblaster Spray Wand, Features: Trigger Gun Holder - Spray Wand Holder - Onboard Detergent Tank – Hose Reel, Wheel Size: 195mm, Electric Cord: 35ft. with GFCI, Warranty: Two Year Limited Karcher Warranty, Product Weight: 32 pounds, Product Dimensions: 13.07 inches x 16.77 inches x 34.33 inches.
feature_bullets: Cleaner. Quicker. NOTE: Refer to the manual for troubleshooting steps
Integrated hose reel for easy storage – 25ft high pressure hose
Vario Power Spray wand – easily adjust spray right from the wand
Dirtblaster spray wand – tackles the hardest jobs in half the time
N-COR pump – durable, non-corrosive and maintenance-free
Water cooled induction motor – increases life by up to 5X. Maximum water inlet Temp (°F) - 104

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars533 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
